args.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that the subject is a constituent, sub-aspect, or component of the object within a broader whole (which may be a concept, practice, belief system, or other structured entity).
args.justification: This relation instance expresses the same generic part–whole semantics as the other three relations in the chunk (burial practices as part of Ancient Egyptian culture). To keep a consistent schema, the canonical_rel_name should be aligned to the normalized predicate 'is_part_of', and the more narrowly scoped rel_cls 'cultural_system_component_relation' should be generalized to the same part_whole_relation class used by the other instances, all under the COMPOSITION group.
args.remark: Normalized to the generic part–whole predicate and class to be consistent with other similar cultural part-whole relations in this cluster.
